Description: Papyrus written with black in with demotic legal document: 8 ll. on recto, list of 16 witnesses on verso. Contract of cession of inherited tombs: Thaubastis daughter of Padineterwy cedes property of brother-in-law Patemis son of Panouphis to her nephew Panouphis son of Psenenteris. Scribe Peteesis son of Paes. Dated month of Phamenoth of year 8 of Ptolemy Philopator. Concerning the same property and parties, cf. P BM EA 10227.
Curator's comments: Publ. Revillout rev. eg. l 135 pl.8 (Extract only)
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.52-3, pl.37, 40-41)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2726) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2726)
